name: Le Méridien Phuket Beach Resort
address: 29 Soi Karon Nui, Tambon Karon, Amphur Muang, Phuket City 83100
description: A luxurious beach getaway like no other awaits you on a secluded cove against a canvas of sand and sea in Thailand. Le Méridien Phuket Beach Resort offers bold new discoveries with top-rated hotel and resort facilities for land and water adventures, a rejuvenating spa, inspired cuisine and forward-thinking services exceeding your wildest desires. The resort's 416 rooms and 54 luxury suites blend the creative and the elemental with authentic Thai accents against a soothing tropical setting. Style coupled with superb amenities allows for a stay of limitless exploration and renewal on the beach. All rooms and suites at our beach resort in Phuket offer unique views, and 67% offer either pool or ocean views.Marriott

name: Amari Phuket
description: A stone’s throw from Patong Beach, the luxurious Amari Phuket enjoys spectacular views of the Andaman Sea from its private beach. It boasts 2 outdoor pools, a first-class spa and 2 dining options. Free Wi-Fi is available in the public areas. Located in southern Phuket, 1.5 km from Bangla Road and Jungceylon Mall, Amari Phuket provides free shuttle services to Kata Beach. It is a 55-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Bright and airy, rooms come with private balconies and beautiful views. Amenities include a satellite TV, DVD player and tea/coffee making facilities. Breeze Spa features a wide range of beauty treatments. Relaxing massages and therapies can be enjoyed from sea-facing pavilions. The hotel also provides an outdoor spa pool and a fitness centre. La Gritta serves Italian dishes featuring gourmet pizzas, fresh pasta, delectable desserts along with an extensive wine list. Seaside international dining is available at Rim Talay and the spectacular Jetty Restaurant. Drinks and quick bites are served at both the Rim Talay Pool and Samutr Bars.

name: Bella Nara Phuket Naiyang Beach
address: 55 Moo 5, Sakoo Subdistrict, Thalang District Phuket, Sakhu 83110

name: Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
description: Indulge yourself at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa on Phuket Island, Thailand. Our Phuket beachfront resort offers a variety of on-site restaurants and bars. Sample exquisite Thai cuisine, global comfort food and specialty coffee drinks or sip handcrafted cocktails at our beachfront bar and eatery. Cap off a day at the beach with a rejuvenating massage or wellness treatment at the famous Quan Spa. Maintain your workout at our luxury resort in Phuket's fitness center or swim in our refreshing resort outdoor pool. If you're planning a business, wedding or social gathering in Phuket, host your event in one of our contemporary venues with help from our dedicated planning and catering teams. Retire to a luxury hotel room or beachfront villa that features stylish decor, plush bedding and sleek bathrooms with robes, slippers and deluxe toiletries. Unwind under the warm Phuket sun in tropical resort villas with private plunge pools. Your next great adventure awaits at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: Sala Phuket Mai Khao Beach Resort (Sha Plus+)
description: Situated along quiet Mai Khao Beach, SALA Phuket Resort features lush garden, 2 beachfront pools and villas with private pools and sundecks. A spa with sauna and steam bath facilities is offered. SALA Phuket Resort & Spa is a 20-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. The scenic Phang Nga Bay is a 25-minute ride away. SALA’s rooms and villas offer flat-screen cable TVs and DVD players. Its villas offer outdoor bathrooms with free-standing tubs overlooking the pool. Free Wi-Fi is provided. SALA Spa features 3 beachfront massage terraces which provide respite for tired bodies. A gym is available for fitness-conscious guests. SALA Phuket offers rooftop dining featuring panoramic beach views. Seafood, international and Thai cuisine is served. Guests can sip cocktails and wines at the beachbar and lobby bar while soaking in the calming atmosphere.

name: The Surin Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: The Surin Phuket offers a tropical getaway on Pansea Beach’s white sands. This beachfront property offers cottage-style accommodation surrounded by coconut trees. It features an outdoor pool and a spa. Guests enjoy free welcome drink and complimentary use of non-motorized sport facilities. Our hotel’s design is classy and elegant. Built into the tropical bay and verdant environment, while no elevators are installed, guests can appreciate the nature through a series of stairs and walkways that connect the resort Patong’s vibrant nightlife is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. Phuket Town is a 40-minute drive away. Rooms come with spacious outdoor lounge areas with garden and beach views. Amenities include a satellite TV. Guests can try various water sports. The sundeck on the beach offers a beautiful view of the Andaman Sea, especially at sunset. The hotel’s dining outlets offer Thai, Western and Asian menus. Barbecue and seafood specialities are also available.

name: Amatara Welleisure Resort - Sha Extra Plus
description: Amatara Welleisure Resort presents a timelessly fresh, effortlessly Thai and bespoke resort experience, and features one of South-east Asias best ocean-view spa and wellness facilities. With a personality all of its own and benefitting from one of the regions most incredible locations, Amatara Wellness Resort offers an unrivalled way to explore and enjoy Southern Thailand, an endlessly popular and world renowned leisure and tourism destination.iHotelier/iStay

name: Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach (Sha Plus+)
description: Plan a luxury escape to Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach. Whether you’re visiting Thailand for a family holiday, couple’s getaway or business trip, our five-star resort in Phuket’s location on the sands of Tri-Trang Beach provides a spectacular backdrop. Stay minutes from the entertainment hub of Patong Beach and Phuket Old Town. Take advantage of family-friendly resort amenities, including a 24 hour fitness center, three pools, children's activities and a day spa. Relax at our swim-up bar and sample delicious cuisine at one of the ten restaurants and bars at our Phuket, Thailand, resort. If you're hosting a meeting, choose from over 8,000 square feet of event space, including poolside and beachside settings and one of the largest ballrooms in Phuket. Unwind in rooms and suites featuring plush bedding, flat-screen TVs, mini-refrigerators, work desks, free Wi-Fi and private balconies with pool, garden, beach or sea views. A sophisticated stay awaits at Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin BeachMarriott

name: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club (SHA Plus+)
description: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club welcomes you to Thailand with contemporary comfort and style. Our family-friendly vacation ownership resort is ideal for relaxation, with a great location on Phuket Island and full access to all the luxurious facilities at the adjacent JW Marriott Phuket Resort and Spa. Explore the area from our beachside resort, where we place you minutes from notable attractions and the pristine sands of Mai Khao Beach. Relax with your family by one of the resort pools or break a sweat in the on-site fitness center before spoiling yourself with a spa treatment or drink at the beachfront bar. Satisfy your appetite at our resort's array of restaurants, including a modern steakhouse, Japanese fare and an Italian eatery with pizza delivery. Our spacious two-bedroom apartments feature complimentary Wi-Fi, full kitchens, master suites with soaking tubs, washers, dryers and furnished balconies so you can spread out during your time in Thailand. Your dream getaway awaits at Marriott's Phuket Beach Club.Marriott

name: Sri Panwa Phuket Luxury Pool Villa Hotel (Sha Plus+)
description: Sri panwa enjoys an idyllic setting within 40 acres of lush tropical rain forest, perched high atop Cape Panwa. With each private pool villa carefully designed to showcase the true beauty of its coastal environment, this secluded resort has been hailed as one of Thailands greatest venues, situated 40 - 60 meters above the sea level, commanding breathtaking views of the surrounding Phuket islands and Andaman Sea.All the luxurious pool villas offer panoramic ocean views, while some boast full and uninterrupted 300-degree ocean views, a total of 52-pool villas range from one to five bedrooms. The interiors embrace the essence of Tropical Contemporary design by integrating its natural jungle and ocean surroundings with the modern comforts of luxury living.Services and facilities include a panoramic sea-view Beach Pool set just over Sri panwas beach, gym & fitness facilities, play room, business center & library, steam rooms, tennis courts, Cool Spa, Baba Dining Lounge and Baba Poolclub.iHotelier/iStay

name: Cassia Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Cool markets, fresh seafood, Andaman's awesome beaches and a trendy island vibe - all at Cassia Phuket. Get comfy in our fantabulous serviced apartments, each with stylish living and chef-perfect kitchens, daily buffet brekkie, free WIFI and swanky hangou t spots in the resort or beyond laguna complex. Socialise with like-minded global nomads across the world. Come and live the best of both worlds here at Cassia Phuket.accorhotels.com

name: Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach (SHA Plus+)
address: 92, 92/1 Moo 3, Tambol Sakoo, Amphur, Talang, Phuket City 83110
description: Expect the ultimate comfort at Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach. Ideal for families, couples and business travelers, our Nai Yang beach resort inspires relaxation with beachfront rooms and private villas, each featuring plush bedding, marble bathrooms, mini-refrigerators, flat-panel TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. Elevate your stay in a scenic beach villa with a private garden and a 400-meter pool. Relax on our resort's private beach or try out the exciting water activities at Yacht Haven and Royal Phuket Marinas. Reserve one of our dynamic meeting venues, enhanced by cutting-edge AV services, custom catering and skilled event planners. End your day in Phuket, Thailand, with a swim in our lagoon pool, a rejuvenating treatment at our resort spa or delectable fare and creative cocktails at our restaurants and bar. Set on the sands of Nai Yang Beach, minutes from Phuket International Airport, our scenic resort offers guests a serene haven in one of the world's most beautiful destinations.Marriott

name: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas (Sha Plus+)
description: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas is set on Phuket, and offers 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a private beach. Popular facilities, such as outdoor tennis courts and free Wi-Fi, ensure a satisfying stay in Mai Khao. The property offers a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. Facilities include facial and body treatments, plus a beauty centre and a kids club. Villas at Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas feature a rain shower, a complimentary fruit bowl and a coffee maker. All are air conditioned and offer a private terrace, a marble bathroom and an iPod docking station. They also have a private garden, luxury linen and a pillow menu. Surrounded by the natural beauty of Sirinat National Park, the property provides a selection of outdoor activities, such as fishing, canoeing and snorkeling. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Mai Khao.Revato

name: JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
description: Plan an unforgettable escape to our Phuket, Thailand beach hotel. JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa is a 5-star, family-friendly resort just steps from Mai Khao Beach. From our beachfront resort in Phuket, Thailand, enjoy easy access to the islands of Phang Nga Bay, Old Town Phuket and the Royal Phuket Marina. Resort guests are treated to an award-winning spa, three outdoor pools, a modern fitness center and activities such as Thai cooking classes. Plan your special occasion in our beachfront hotel in Phuket, Thailand's indoor and outdoor venues with advanced technology, custom catering and dedicated event planners. Relax in family-friendly hotel rooms, suites and villas filled with five-star amenities like plush bedding, marble bathrooms, 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi and outdoor space overlooking tropical gardens or the ocean. Select resort rooms have whirlpool tubs, extra living space and private pools. Create lasting memories at JW Marriott Phuket Resort & Spa in Thailand.Marriott

name: The Slate (Sha Plus+)
address: 116 Moo 1 Tambol Sakhu, Talang, Phuket, Sakhu 83110
description: The Slate, Phuket presents industrial chic design set against the beautiful natural backdrop of Nai Yang Beach and Andaman Sea. Offering beachfront rooms, it also has a rainforest spa and 3 outdoor pools, one is open for family while the other 2 pools are for adults only. Uniquely decorated with original art pieces and locally crafted furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms feature rich wood and cool stone accents. A flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and bottled water are included in all rooms. The Slate, Phuket is just 5 minutes' drive from Phuket International Airport. It is a 10-minute drive from Blue Canyon Golf Course and Mission Hills Golf Club. Coqoon Spa offers ultimate relaxation with body massage and facials in The Nest, a private treatment room suspended mid-air like a bird nest. For a refreshing workout, the fitness centre provides yoga, pilates and Muay Thai classes. Guests may experience the charm of Thailand with the hotel's Thai cooking classes, language lessons and Weekend Market day trips. There is also a dive centre and kitesurfing centre next to the hotel. Five dining options leave guests spoilt for choice, serving everything from a breakfast buffet to fresh seafood barbecue dinners. Tongkah Tin Syndicate provides a snooker hall and international whiskeys.

name: The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Escape to a hidden paradise. The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket is tucked off the east coast of Thailand and offers unsurpassed privacy in the Andaman Sea as the only property on Phuket Island. Journey to our oceanfront beach resort in Phuket by a short speedboat ride and immerse in enchanting coconut groves, beaches and limestone cliffs. Unwind with a cocktail at waterfront Z Bar or the unexpected flavors at our three beachside restaurants. Luxuriate at Spa Naka with a revitalizing massage, facial or wellness service, and stay active with daily hotel happenings, eco-friendly experiences such as planting mangrove trees or fitness center with Technogym® equipment. In your hotel room, suite or villa, discover the same level of refinement and attention to detail. Accommodations are distinct and radiant, boasting scenic views of the garden, sea, beach or terrace. Together with our vacation packages, curate an unforgettable stay at The Naka Island, a Luxury Collection Resort & Spa, Phuket.Marriott

name: Cape Panwa Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Cape Panwa Hotel where a long, sandy, private beach and the nearby shade of the hillside coconut plantation enhance a truly tropical feel. Relaxing in the generous comfort of your fully-appointed suite or simply strolling hand-in-hand next to gently rippling wavelets, feel the stresses and strains of everyday life just melt away. Cape Panwa Hotel, a former haunt of royalty and current favorite of ‘A’-listers, retains the warmest of welcomes where everyone can feel treated like a very special visitor, thanks to the care and attentions of a staff of whom we are truly proud. A short hop from Phuket town, Cape Panwa Hotel offers all the services and facilities you would expect of a Cape property, with a range of restaurants to suit all tastes and the renowned Cape Spa. It is also an ideal venue for weddings or other celebrations under the caring and expert guidance of our dedicated Function Planner and the team. This is the venue to get back in touch with nature, with each other or just with yourself. Whether for a short family break or a working holiday, Cape Panwa wins hands-down every time.
